id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the location

city.type: VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Name of the city where the location is

address.type: TEXT NOT NULL -- Specific street address of the location

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the client

full_name.type: VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Full name of the client

email.type: VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, -- Email address of the client

phone.type: VARCHAR(20), -- Phone number of the client

created_at.type: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP -- Timestamp of when the client was registered

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the bike type

name.type: VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL -- Name of the bike type (e.g., mountain, road, electric)

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the discount

name.type: VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Name of the discount (e.g., "Summer Promo")

description.type: TEXT, -- Detailed description of the discount

percentage.type: NUMERIC(5, 2) NOT NULL CHECK (percentage BETWEEN 0 AND 100), -- Discount percentage (0â€“100%)

valid_from.type: DATE, -- Start date when the discount is valid

valid_to.type: DATE -- End date when the discount expires

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the bike

model.type: VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Model name of the bike

type_id.type: INT REFERENCES bike_types(id), -- Foreign key referencing the bike type

location_id.type: INT REFERENCES locations(id), -- Foreign key indicating the current location of the bike

status.type: VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'available', -- Status of the bike (e.g., available, rented, maintenance)

daily_price.type: NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL -- Rental price per day for the bike

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the rental transaction

client_id.type: INT REFERENCES clients(id), -- Foreign key referencing the renting client

bike_id.type: INT REFERENCES bikes(id), -- Foreign key referencing the rented bike

rental_start.type: TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, -- Timestamp when the rental started

rental_end.type: TIMESTAMP, -- Timestamp when the rental ended (nullable for ongoing rentals)

total_price.type: NUMERIC(10, 2), -- Total price charged for the rental

location_pickup_id.type: INT REFERENCES locations(id), -- Foreign key indicating the pickup location

location_dropoff_id.type: INT REFERENCES locations(id), -- Foreign key indicating the drop-off location

discount_id.type: INT REFERENCES discounts(id), -- Foreign key referencing any applied discount

status.type: VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active' -- Status of the rental (e.g., active, completed, cancelled)

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the maintenance log entry

bike_id.type: INT REFERENCES bikes(id), -- Foreign key referencing the bike that was serviced

description.type: TEXT NOT NULL, -- Description of the maintenance work performed

maintenance_date.type: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP -- Timestamp when maintenance was performed

id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for the accessory

name.type: VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, -- Name of the accessory (e.g., helmet, child seat)

daily_price.type: NUMERIC(10, 2) -- Rental price per day for the accessory

rental_id.type: INT REFERENCES rentals(id), -- Foreign key referencing the rental transaction

accessory_id.type: INT REFERENCES bike_accessories(id), -- Foreign key referencing the accessory

quantity.type: INT DEFAULT 1, -- Number of units of this accessory rented
